query:
ALTER TABLE `notification_preferences` 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `enable_skill_update_alerts` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `notification_frequency` enum('instant','hourly','daily','weekly') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'instant',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `quiet_hours_start` int,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `quiet_hours_end` int;
